scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:%(to_user)s@%(to_domain)s:%(to_port)s> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [routes] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [routes] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 30 Content-Length: 0
